customer_reviews.title: It has done fine in playing cds and downloading
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as my new iMac did not have a disc drive. It has done fine in playing cds and downloading. I have been trying to burn CDs however, the does not seem to be functional. it is difficult for me to determine if it is a device or a computer issue. It however, is frustrating, to say the least! I want to say how great the customer service has been!!! I still don't know why it stopped burning cds, but the company has been great and has replaced the drive. I am increasing my rating by a star. fingers crossed, it will work just fine. the customerr service is truly 5 stars.
